amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to detain, without conviction, any person for more than 15 years at the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to detain, without conviction, any person for more than 15 years at the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A068) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
